dct_title_s: Chart of the world exhibiting its chief physical features, currents of the ocean, &c.
dct_description_sm: At head of map: II-I. World maps showing physical features, precipitation, population distribution and religions. Plate II-I from: General atlas of the world ... / engraved on steel ... by Sidney Hall, William Hughes ... New ed. Edinburgh : Adam and Charles Black ... , 1854.
dct_publisher_sm: Edinburgh : Published by A. & C. Black, [1854]
